name: Dice Swap
description:
Dice Swap is a game based on "dice" luck. You roll die that you can put into slots that have different properties. You have slots like speed slot that controls your movement speed,and jump that controls how high you jump.

Controls:

Move: A and D / 🡰 and 🡲

Jump: W / 🡱

Hold or release dice: Left mouse button

This is a submission to GMTK 2022.
